# sapiens

The sapiens package was develop with the propouse to deploy diffrent interactive apps based in diferents realeased packages for resolve especifics problems in the scientific research. 

## Installation

You can install sapiens from github with:

```{r gh-installation, eval = FALSE}

devtools::install_github("Flavjack/sapiens")

```

## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

```{r example}
elisios()
```
